description.value:
This venom erodes its target's defenses, aiding the spider in securing prey.

Activate 2 (manipulate)

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:22]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 @Damage[1d10[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 1} (1 round)

Stage 2 @Damage[1d12[poison]] damage, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 1}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 2} (1 round)

Stage 3 @Damage[2d6[poison]] damage, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 2}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 3} (1 round)
